title: Dyad [Version 2.0.0.3][GOG]
description:
Dyad is the second highest rated PS3 Exclusive game of 2012, finally hitting the PC!
Unique abstract visuals, innovative interactive music system, and constantly evolving game mechanics mean you'll always be on your toes.
One of the fastest, most colorful, and most intense gaming experiences ever created!

Overview:
Experience a mind-bending, psychedelic sensory overload when Dyad hits the PC on April 24th! Blast through a reactive audio-visual tube creating a harmonious synthesis of color and sound as you hook, graze, and lance enemies to master Dyad's 27 unique levels.

Dyad was released last year for the PlayStation 3 where it was the second highest rated PS3 Exclusive of 2012 on Metacritic.

Embark on an interactive transformative journey thorugh Dyad's Game Mode campaign to prepare yourself for Trophy Mode's tactical freakout variations. Or choose to sit back and chill with Dyad's hallucinogenic Remix Mode. Transcendence awaits!


Install and Play.
